clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
The terms of service state: "Signal may update the Terms from time to time. When we update our Terms, we will update the “Last Modified” date associated with the updated Terms. Your continued use of our Services confirms your acceptance of our updated Terms and supersedes any prior Terms. You will comply with all applicable export control and trade sanctions laws. Our Terms cover the entire agreement between you and Signal regarding our Services. If you do not agree with our Terms, you should stop using our Services."

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to $100
clauses.clause_text: OUR AGGREGATE LIABILITY RELATING TO, ARISING OUT OF, OR IN ANY WAY IN CONNECTION WITH OUR TERMS, US, OR OUR SERVICES WILL NOT EXCEED ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS ($100).

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: Signal is designed to never collect or store any sensitive information.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Our goal has always been to develop open source privacy technology that protects free expression and enables secure global communication.

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
clauses.description: The service will attempt to protect user information to a great extent, even so far as stating that they will only follow legal requirements to disclose user information in circumstances where this cannot be reasonably resisted.
clauses.clause_text: This is the first subpoena that we’ve received. It originally included a broad gag order that would have prevented us from publishing this notice, but the ACLU represented us in quickly and successfully securing our ability to publish the transcripts below.

case.text: The service will resist legal requests for your information where reasonably possible

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You can manage your personal information in Signal’s application Settings.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: The laws of the State of California govern our Terms, as well as any disputes, whether in court or arbitration, which might arise between Signal and you, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that only keep the strictly necessary logs on their servers and therefore protect your privacy.
clauses.clause_text:
"We’ve designed the Signal service to minimize the data we retain about Signal users, so the only information we can produce in response to a request like this is the date and time a user registered with Signal and the last date of a user’s connectivity to the Signal service."

case.text: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

clauses.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text:
Signal Terms &. Privacy Policy

Signal is designed to never collect or store any sensitive information. Signal messages and calls cannot be accessed by us or other third parties because they are always end-to-end encrypted, private, and secure.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text:
"Signal messages, pictures, files, and other contents are stored locally on your device. These contents are readable by the open source Signal clients. Because everything in Signal is end-to-end encrypted, the Signal service does not have access to any of this data. There are several community-developed open source utilities that are capable of parsing locally stored Signal content. Android users can also help us test a new backup feature that makes it possible to move your local Signal data between devices (Signal Settings > Chats and media > Chat backups)."

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Signal messages and calls cannot be accessed by us or other third parties because they are always end-to-end encrypted, private, and secure.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: This service does not force users into binding arbitration
clauses.description: Binding Arbitration is a dispute resolution method involving a neutral third party which will render a decision instead of going to court. Since the arbitrator can decide the outgoing of a dispute without evidences or a legal basis, it is preferable that users decide whether they want or not their dispute to be resolved this way.
clauses.clause_text:
You agree to resolve any Claim you have with us relating to or arising out of our Terms, us, or our Services exclusively in the United States District Court for the Northern District of California or a state court in San Mateo County, California.
You also agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of such courts for the purpose of litigating all such disputes.

case.text: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: "Signal messages, pictures, files, and other contents are stored locally on your device. These contents are readable by the open source Signal clients. Because everything in Signal is end-to-end encrypted, the Signal service does not have access to any of this data. [...] You can permanently disable your phone number from being recognized as a Signal user by unregistering your phone number here. You will need access to this phone number to verify and complete this action."

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Can I export my data out of Signal?
Signal messages, pictures, files, and other contents are stored locally on your device. These contents are readable by the open source Signal clients. Because everything in Signal is end-to-end encrypted, the Signal service does not have access to any of this data.

There are several community-developed open source utilities that are capable of parsing locally stored Signal content. Android users can also move local Signal data between devices (Signal Settings . >. Chats and media >. Chat backups).

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
Information you provide

Account Information. You register a phone number when you create a Signal account. Phone numbers are used to provide our Services to you and other Signal users. You may optionally add other information to your account, such as a profile name and profile picture. This information is end-to-end encrypted.

Messages. Signal cannot decrypt or otherwise access the content of your messages or calls. Signal queues end-to-end encrypted messages on its servers for delivery to devices that are temporarily offline (e.g. a phone whose battery has died). Your message history is stored on your own devices.

Additional technical information is stored on our servers, including randomly generated authentication tokens, keys, push tokens, and other material that is necessary to establish calls and transmit messages. Signal limits this additional technical information to the minimum required to operate the Services.

Contacts. Signal can optionally discover which contacts in your address book are Signal users, using a service designed to protect the privacy of your contacts. Information from the contacts on your device may be cryptographically hashed and transmitted to the server in order to determine which of your contacts are registered.

User Support. If you contact Signal User Support, any personal data you may share with us is kept only for the purposes of researching the issue and contacting you about your case.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text:
To meet any applicable law, regulation, legal process or enforceable governmental request.
  • To enforce applicable Terms, including investigation of potential violations.
  • To detect, prevent, or otherwise address fraud, security, or technical issues.
  • To protect against harm to the rights, property, or safety of Signal, our users, or the public as required or permitted by law.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.
clauses.clause_text: We will update this privacy policy as needed so that it is current, accurate, and as clear as possible.

case.text: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

clauses.title: The service provides two factor authentication for your account
clauses.description: The service provides means of further securing your account with two factor authentification, thus greatly improving account security.
clauses.clause_text: you can update your profile information or choose to enable additional privacy features like a Registration Lock PIN.

case.text: Two factor authentication is provided for your account

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: The terms of service state that "Signal does not sell, rent or monetize your personal data or content in any way – ever."

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: The terms state: "You may optionally add other information to your account, such as a profile name and profile picture. This information is end-to-end encrypted." The profile name is therefore not visible to Signal (and hence they cannot determine what it should say). The terms also otherwise do not mention restrictions on the name you choose.

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: These providers are bound by their Privacy Policies to safeguard that information.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text:
See more Signal and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)

Signal is committed to protecting your privacy and the security of your data.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: Signal queues end-to-end encrypted messages on its servers for delivery to devices that are temporarily offline (e.g. a phone whose battery has died). Your message history is stored on your own devices.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You may end these Terms with Signal at any time by deleting Signal Messenger from your device and discontinuing use of our Services.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Prohibits the publishing of personally identifiable information without the owner’s consent
clauses.description: Users agree not to publicly post personally identifiable information (name, postal address, contact information…) without the owner’s knowledge or consent
clauses.clause_text: violate or infringe the rights of Signal, our users, or others, including privacy, publicity, intellectual property, or other proprietary rights.

case.text: The publishing of personally identifiable information without the owner’s consent is not allowed

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: THE SIGNAL PARTIES WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY LOST PROFITS OR CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, INDIRECT, OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES RELATING TO, ARISING OUT OF, OR IN ANY WAY IN CONNECTION WITH OUR TERMS, US, OR OUR SERVICES, EVEN IF THE SIGNAL PARTIES HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

clauses.title: You must create an account to use this service
clauses.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

clauses.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
clauses.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.

clauses.title: You must be at least 13 years old to use the service
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

clauses.title: This service informs users that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.
clauses.clause_text: When you use third-party services, their terms and privacy policies govern your use of those services.

case.text: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Court of law is in California
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: The terms of service state: "You agree to resolve any Claim you have with us relating to or arising out of our Terms, us, or our Services exclusively in the United States District Court for the Northern District of California or a state court in San Mateo County, California. You also agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of such courts for the purpose of litigating all such disputes. The laws of the State of California govern our Terms, as well as any disputes, whether in court or arbitration, which might arise between Signal and you, without regard to conflict of law provisions."

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

clauses.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: The privacy policy states: "We work with third parties to provide some of our Services. For example, our Third-Party Providers send a verification code to your phone number when you register for our Services. These providers are bound by their Privacy Policies to safeguard that information. If you use other Third-Party Services like YouTube, Spotify, Giphy, etc. in connection with our Services, their Terms and Privacy Policies govern your use of those services."

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
clauses.description: You are responsible for the interactions and the disputes that may occur with other users of the Service. In the event of a dispute, you release the Service from all claims resulting from it.
clauses.clause_text: WE DO NOT CONTROL, AND ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR, CONTROLLING HOW OR WHEN OUR USERS USE OUR SERVICES.

case.text: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
